The applicant argued that he had not received the letter of DATE .

The President also noted that due to the fact that the applicant had not corrected the defects , his statement of claim with accompanying documents would be returned to him . The applicant alleges that he only received the letters of CARDINAL May and DATE on CARDINAL and DATE , respectively .

From DATE the applicant was a party to a dispute in which he attempted to challenge a ORG regulation of CARDINAL DATE concerning assessment of living surface in housing LOC .
